name: Smoky Iced Tea and Whiskey Cooler
description: The cocktail is smoky and complex without being heavy. It's got a lightness that comes from the lemon juice and ginger liqueur that make for a dangerously sippable drink.
recipeIngredient: 3 ounces brewed Lapsang Souchong tea, chilled
1 ounce Domaine de Canton ginger liqueur

recipeInstructions.text: In a cocktail shaker filled with ice, combine tea, lemon, ginger liqueur, whisky, and bitters. Shake for 12 seconds. Strain into a Collins glass filled with ice. Garnish with lemon twist and serve immediately.
